distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for openexr fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed: 	  

- CVE-2017-9111: Fixed an invalid write of size 8 in the storeSSE function in ImfOptimizedPixelReading.h (bsc#1040109).
- CVE-2017-9113: Fixed an invalid write of size 1 in the bufferedReadPixels function in ImfInputFile.cpp (bsc#1040113).
- CVE-2017-9115: Fixed an invalid write of size 2 in the = operator function inhalf.h (bsc#1040115).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: CSAF 2.0 data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In OpenEXR 2.2.0, an invalid write of size 8 in the storeSSE function in ImfOptimizedPixelReading.h could cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code.

notes.text: In OpenEXR 2.2.0, an invalid write of size 2 in the = operator function in half.h could cause the application to crash or execute arbitrary code.
notes.title: CVE description
